original_title: As Aventuras da Turma da Mônica
overview: 4 stories. In the first, Mônica and her friends are introduced to the people. In the second, Mônica gets miniaturized and has an affair with a little mouse. In the third episode, Mônica becomes a hermit. And the last segment shows Earth being invaded by interplanetary rabbits.
title: As Aventuras da Turma da Mônica
